external_games.name: Mahjong Bengal Tiger Adventure: Summer Majong Quest Deluxe

name: Mahjong Bengal Tiger Adventure: Summer Majong Quest Deluxe
summary: Unbelievably cool Mahjong, in which you have to play with more than 100 levels of varying difficulty. Every week updated levels. Unique and various chips on Chinese themes will not leave you indifferent. The game has a lot of chips with animals, especially the original and beautiful pieces from the Tigers. This is a real mahjong solitaire style tiger.
